body_text: I think moving the inner logic into another function doesn't reduce complexity, it just shifts it to another function in the same context. I don't think that's beneficial. If there was a opportunity for re-use or simplification, I'd go for it, but I don't think there is here.
body: I think moving the `inner` logic into another function doesn't reduce complexity, it just shifts it to another function in the same context. I don't think that's beneficial. If there was a opportunity for re-use or simplification, I'd go for it, but I don't think there is here.
body_html: I think moving the inner logic into another function doesn't reduce complexity, it just shifts it to another function in the same context. I don't think that's beneficial. If there was a opportunity for re-use or simplification, I'd go for it, but I don't think there is here.
